list_definition.definition: (the) place or point to which one moves, looks etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What direction did he go in?
They were heading in my direction (= towards me)
I’ll find my way all right – I’ve got a good sense of direction.

list_definition.definition: instructions (eg on how to get somewhere, use something etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We asked the policeman for directions
I have lost the directions for this washing-machine.

list_definition.definition: the act of aiming or turning (something or someone) towards a certain point.

list_ex_of_english: Possible directions for further research are also considered.
A roof may in the first place have been chosen because it represented a location that could easily be seen from various directions.
The reconstruction of this relationship is here presented in three aspects, the theoretical, the applied, and future directions.
We recall known results about this problem and suggest new methods and directions.
Other directions for future research would include intervention research that makes use of developmental models idenified through correlational research.
Additionally, innovations in archaeological theory and methodology have led to the exploration of new directions of inquiry.
Finally, we think that our empirical analysis can be extended in different directions.
If they were to go in different directions, then the physical powers would be acting against themselves.
